eng:
Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Many people are attending a seminar.
- (2) A large screen is visible at the top of the image.
- (3) Everyone is eating food in the conference room.
- (4) There are lights installed in the ceiling.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) People are sitting and chatting inside the cafe.
- (2) A barista is working behind the counter.
- (3) There is a yellow wall behind the counter.
- (4) There are multiple chairs and tables set up.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) There are various types of bread on display.
- (2) The staff is wearing a white hat.
- (3) The bread does not have price tags.
- (4) There is a glass display case.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Several people are sitting and conversing.
- (2) The outside view can be seen through the windows.
- (3) There are books piled on the table.
- (4) Lighting fixtures are installed on the ceiling.
